text: The 1937 Tour de Hongrie was the 11th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 26 to 30 June 1937. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Anton Strakati. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1937 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 4 September | Budapest to Szeged | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 5 September | Szeged to Debrecen | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 6 September | Debrecen to Budapest | | |- ! scope="col" | 4 | style="text- align:right;" | 7 September | Budapest to Keszthely | | |- ! scope="col" | 5 | style="text-align:right;" | 8 September | Keszthely to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text- align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text- align:center;" | 1 | | Austria | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text- align:center;" | 2 | | Poland | style="text-align:right;" | + 1" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Hungary | style="text-align:right;" | + 5" |} |} ==References== 1937 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
